alert.note: Alert for Grand Isle (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 29 at 2:52AM EST until November 30 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 3 PM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...In New York, Northern Franklin, Eastern Clinton, Southeastern St. Lawrence, Southern Franklin, Western Clinton and Southwestern St. Lawrence Counties. In Vermont, Grand Isle County. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 3 PM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
